      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector2 Pattern.addBit(Bit2D bit) 
      Vector2 Layer.addBit(Bit2D bit)
      Add a bit to the Layer.referentialPattern and call Layer.rebuild() which will rebuild all the Pattern taking in account this new bit.
      Vector2 Layer.getNewOrientation(Bit2D bit)

      Constructors in meshIneBits with parameters of type Bit2D 
      Constructor and Description
      Bit2D(Bit2D modelBit, double percentageLength, double percentageWidth)
      Constructor to clone an existing bit into a smaller one.
      Constructor parameters in meshIneBits with type arguments of type Bit2D 
      Constructor and Description
      Bit3D(java.util.Vector<Bit2D> bits2D, Vector2 origin, Vector2 orientation, int sliceToSelect)
      2 reasons to have all the included bit2D in parameter : - It is the Bit3D itself which determines if it can be build or not, therefore it needs all the informations to do so. - The next improvement will be a 3D laser cut of the bits, in that scenario every bit2D are necessary to determine the 3D shape of the bit Refer to the report for an explanation on the parameter sliceToSelect.
      Pattern(java.util.Hashtable<Vector2,Bit2D> mapBits, Vector2 rotation, java.awt.geom.AffineTransform transfoMatrix, java.awt.geom.AffineTransform inverseTransfoMatrix) 
      Pattern(java.util.Vector<Bit2D> bits, Vector2 rotation) 

    • Uses of Bit2D in meshIneBits.util

      Methods in meshIneBits.util with parameters of type Bit2D 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean DetectorTool.checkIrregular(Bit2D bit)
      Detect if bit is irregular by comparing the number of lift points on bit and its separated areas' one (each separated area has no more than 1 lift point).
